name: Woo Beanstream Hosted Payment
author: Bhavik Patel

sections.description:
The Woo Beanstream Payment gateway plugin allows you to accept online payments in your WordPress To Beanstream soted Form. Download the Woo – Beanstream hosted Payment Getway and start accepting payments Via Beanstream Payment getway

Main features:

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
Simply follow these steps to install
1. Unzip the file.
1. Upload the “woo-beanstream-payment.zip” folder to your WordPress Plugins directory.
1. Login to your WordPress Admin, then go to Plugins and activate the “Woo Beanstream Hosted Payment Getway” plugin
1. Within the WordPress Admin, go to WooCommerce >> Settings, then click on the Payment Gateways tab, then click on the Beanstream link.
1. Enter the proper information…
